author: Anthony Adragna and Sam Mintz
title: Trump considering some domestic air travel restrictions
description: The idea of shutting down domestic air travel in an effort to curb the virus' spread has popped up over the past few weeks but never come to fruition.
content:
Asked during the same briefing if he was considering a broader ban or more targeted restrictions, Trump said: We're looking at the whole thing, and suggested the administration would offer recommendations soon.
Trumps comments come after Sen. Lindsey Graham … [+1307 chars]
